scripts.install:
git clone https://github.com/maneoverland/leaflet.WorldMiniMap.git node_modules/worldminimap  
 git clone https://github.com/MrMufflon/Leaflet.Coordinates.git node_modules/coordinates 
 git clone https://github.com/Leaflet/Leaflet.markercluster.git -b v1.4.1 node_modules/markercluster 
 git clone https://github.com/thomasbrueggemann/leaflet.boatmarker.git node_modules/boatmarker 
 git clone https://github.com/perliedman/leaflet-realtime.git node_modules/realtime
